## init

<a href="https://github.com/civvic/ctxt/blob/main/ctxt/cli.py#L28"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### init

>  init (force:bool=False)

*Initialize ctxt config from default template*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>force</td>
<td>bool</td>
<td>False</td>
<td>Overwrite existing config</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
with tempfile.TemporaryDirectory() as tmpdir:
    old_cwd = os.getcwd()
    try:
        os.chdir(tmpdir)
        
        # Test 1: Fresh init
        result = init()
        test_eq(result, 0)
        test_eq(Path('.ctxt.yml').exists(), True)
        
        # Test 2: Already exists without force
        result = init()
        test_eq(result, 1)
        
        # Test 3: Force overwrite
        result = init(force=True)
        test_eq(result, 0)
    finally:
        os.chdir(old_cwd)
```

    ✓ Created .ctxt.yml

    Next steps:
      1. Edit .ctxt.yml to customize tags
      2. Create templates/ directory structure
      3. Run 'ctxt build' to process templates
    Config already exists: .ctxt.yml
    Use --force to overwrite
    ✓ Created .ctxt.yml

    Next steps:
      1. Edit .ctxt.yml to customize tags
      2. Create templates/ directory structure
      3. Run 'ctxt build' to process templates

### config_cmd

>  config_cmd (validate:bool=False)

*Show and optionally validate configuration*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>validate</td>
<td>bool</td>
<td>False</td>
<td>Validate configuration</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
# Test with real config
result = config_cmd()
test_eq(result, 0)

result = config_cmd(validate=True)
test_eq(result, 0)

# Test with defaults (no config file)
with tempfile.TemporaryDirectory() as tmpdir:
    old_cwd = os.getcwd()
    try:
        os.chdir(tmpdir)
        result = config_cmd()
        test_eq(result, 0)
    finally:
        os.chdir(old_cwd)
```

    Config: /Users/vic/dev/repo/project/ctxt/.ctxt.yml
    Tags: 7
    Vendors: 2
      • meta (project files)
      • Cursor
      • Claude_Coder
    Config: /Users/vic/dev/repo/project/ctxt/.ctxt.yml
    Tags: 7
    Vendors: 2
      • meta (project files)
      • Cursor
      • Claude_Coder

    ✓ Configuration is valid
    Config: (using defaults)
    Tags: 7
    Vendors: 2
      • meta (project files)
      • Cursor
      • Claude_Coder

### tags

>  tags (path:str|None=None)

*Discover tags in templates*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>path</td>
<td>str | None</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Path to template file or directory</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
# Test with real templates
result = tags()
test_eq(result, 0)

# Test with specific file
template_file = Path('../templates/Cursor/project.mdc')
if template_file.exists():
    result = tags(path=str(template_file))
    test_eq(result, 0)

# Test with nonexistent path
result = tags(path='/nonexistent/path')
test_eq(result, 1)

# Test with no templates dir
with tempfile.TemporaryDirectory() as tmpdir:
    old_cwd = os.getcwd()
    try:
        os.chdir(tmpdir)
        result = tags()
        test_eq(result, 1)
    finally:
        os.chdir(old_cwd)
```

    Tags in templates:
      <Language-Name> ✓
      <Project-Current-Phase> ✓
      <Project-Name> ✓
      <Project-Objective> ✓
      <User-Alias> ✓
      <User-Language-Note> ✓
      <User-Profile> ✓
      <date> ✗ (not defined)
      <file_name> ✗ (not defined)
      <name> ✗ (not defined)
      <session_history> ✗ (not defined)
    Tags in ../templates/Cursor/project.mdc:
      <Project-Current-Phase> ✓
      <Project-Name> ✓
      <Project-Objective> ✓
    Error: Path not found: /nonexistent/path
    Templates directory not found at /private/var/folders/np/k2wj6f4s3rj0m9n0yt8pkk680000gn/T/tmpj5ky4svi/templates
    Create 'templates/' or specify path with --path

### build

>  build (vendor:str|None=None, dry_run:bool=False)

*Build templates from source*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>vendor</td>
<td>str | None</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Specific vendor to build (e.g., ‘Cursor’)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>dry_run</td>
<td>bool</td>
<td>False</td>
<td>Show what would be done without doing it</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
# Test build (dry run to avoid side effects)
result = build(dry_run=True)
test_eq(result, 0)

# Test with nonexistent vendor
result = build(vendor='NonExistent')
test_eq(result, 1)
```

    DRY RUN - No files will be created
    Building all templates...
    Building NonExistent templates...
    Error during build: Vendor 'NonExistent' not found in config

### chelp

>  chelp ()

*Show help for all console scripts*

``` python
chelp()
```

    ctxt                      Build templates from source
    ctxt-config               Show and optionally validate configuration
    ctxt-init                 Initialize ctxt config from default template
    ctxt-tags                 Discover tags in templates
